about_the_game:
WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME! (Or Demo)
Key Features:
1. Game Quits on Death
2. Sprite Ai
3. First Person Shooting
4. Four Weapons With More To Come
5. Political Humor
6. Consistent Updates With New Content
7. Consistent Bug Patches

Game includes features like shooting Trump 3d Sprites. FPS shooting, various guns, and avoiding possible traps. As well as some political humor along the way. This game is a work in progress.
I'm a solo Dev and I like it that way!

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult Political Humor
Using Weapons Against World Leaders
Political Violence

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD R9 260
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubunutu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 5600-XT
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD R9 260
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Mojave)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 5600-XT
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
